H0.text: Which rugby league team will play at Langtree Park in 2012. Wigan Warriors

H1.text: Which rugby league team will play at Langtree Park in 2012. Leeds Rhinos

H2.text: Which rugby league team will play at Langtree Park in 2012. Warrington Wolves

H3.text: Which rugby league team will play at Langtree Park in 2012. St.helens

A4.text: St Helens played their first league game at the ground in 2012, when they won against Salford.

A5.text: The first rugby league match played at the stadium was between St. Helens and Widnes on Friday 20 January 2012.
